text:
The Communist Party of India (Marxist-Leninist) urged the government to order a judicial investigation into the alleged suicide of three students of a college in Kallkkuruchi near Villupuram recently.

Cadres of CPI (ML) staged a demonstration near Semmangudi Road near Nagercoil on Saturday. District secretary S.M. Antony Muthu presided.
title: CPI (ML) demands judicial probe
